title: UNR Drone Approvals, Denials, and Registrations

communications.subject: Nevada Public Records Act Request: UNR Drone Approvals, Denials, and Registrations
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Nevada Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

For the period of January 1, 2022 through January 1, 2024 documentation relating to the use of UAS (unmanned aerial vehicles, also known as drones): 

• approvals, denials, and justifying materials from the Vice President of Research and Innovation (VPRI) regarding UAS use for University faculty, staff, and students. 
• Operations plans for UAS use
• UAS operations applications 
• all UAS registration documents

According to "5,030: Policy on Use of Uncrewed Aircraft Systems (UASs) and Drones" https://www.unr.edu/administrative-manual/5000-5999-general-university-services/5030-policy-on-use-of-unmanned-aerial-vehicles-(uavs)-and-drones approvals and denials are the responsibility of the VPRI.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Ariel Smith

title: Nevada Public Records Act Request: Criteria for Confidentiality of Documents Regarding Starship Delivery Robot Reports (University of Nevada, Reno) (University Of Nevada Reno)

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Nevada Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

Public reports show that the robotic delivery company Starship is operating at your university: https://www.starship.xyz/starship-food-delivery-app/

Therefore I hereby request the following records:

Records which specify the criteria that The University of Nevada, Reno, and The University of Nevada Police consider when determining whether or not a document is confidential- specifically regarding documents associated with Starship Delivery Robots.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

David Kalayanaprapruit

communications.subject: Nevada Public Records Act Request: Starship delivery robot reports
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Nevada Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

Public reports show that the robotic delivery company Starship is operating at your university: https://www.starship.xyz/starship-food-delivery-app/

Therefore, I hereby request the following records:

1) Any traffic complains involving Starships on and around university campus.

2) Any and all protocols on how to deal with them.

Please search between August 1, 2023 and the time this request is processed.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Stormi Welch

title: University of Nevada, Reno Knightscope Communication and Contracts

communications.subject: Nevada Public Records Act Request: University of Nevada, Reno Knightscope Communication and Contracts
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Nevada Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

- Contracts/MOUs/Invoices with Knightscope, Inc.
- Company relations and communications: records related to meetings or follow-up actions with Knightscope, Inc
- All marketing materials - unsolicited, requested, or otherwise - acquired from Knightscope, Inc
- Any policy directives, guidance documents, memoranda, training materials, or similar records governing the use of Knightscope, Inc technology
- Training material governing the use, sharing, or access to any related data related to or collected by Knightscope, Inc, including the legal standard that is required before using the technology

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Lindsay Burback

communications.subject: Nevada Public Records Act Request: Starship delivery robot reports/contracts
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Nevada Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

Public reports show that the robotic delivery company Starship is operating at your university: https://www.starship.xyz/starship-food-delivery-app/

Therefore, I hereby request the following records:

1) All agreements/contracts between the University Dining Program, or UNLV itself, and Starship regarding the use and and policies of the delivery robots. 

2) Any emails regarding Starship from or to Ailisha Vaughn, UNLV Dining marketing manager, or previous UNLV Dining marketing manager at previous time of requests. 

Please search between August 1, 2023 and the time this request is processed.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Skylar Ferguson

title: Starship delivery robot reports (University Of Nevada Reno)

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Nevada Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

Public reports show that the robotic delivery company Starship is operating at your university: https://www.starship.xyz/starship-food-delivery-app/

Therefore, I hereby request the following records:

1) All presentations and presentation materials (including recorded video and audio, PowerPoint files, prepared remarks, and slides formats), and other information presented to the UNR Dining Marketing Coordinator Heidi Rich/University Police Department about Starship/Starship robots.

2) Any agreements/contracts between University of Nevada, Reno and other members of the University about or mentioning Starship delivery robots, including attachments and media. 

3) Any complaints or incident reports received about Starship through UNR PD

4) Any video footage or audio given to the university or university police department by Starship

Please search between August 1, 2021 and the time this request is processed.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Brooke Germain

communications.subject: Nevada Public Records Act Request: Knightscope Contracts/Communications
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Nevada Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

- Contracts/MOUs/Invoices with Knightscope, Inc.
- All marketing materials - unsolicited, requested, or otherwise - acquired from Knightscope, Inc.
- Any policy directives, guidance documents, memoranda, training materials, or similar records governing the use of Knightscope, Inc. technology
- Training material governing the use, sharing, or access to any related data related to or collected by Knightscope, Inc., including the legal standard that is required before using the technology
- Any communications between Knightscope, Inc. and UNRPD personnel Chief Eric James, Equipment, evidence Jeremey Irwin, and Executive Assistant Tanya Wells
- Any documentation relating to the delay in implementation of Knightscope, Inc. technology

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Nicholas Capuano
